resources.string: Something went terribly wrong, the apllication had to close. Try to open it again.

Website: http://blog.androidmashup.org 
 email: info@androidmashup.org 
 
 
 This application and all the special mashup applications (Mashup Panoramio, Mashup Radar, Mashup FonMAPS, OpenFONMAps) are the result of a bachelor thesis at the University of Applied Sciences Berlin (http://www.htw-berlin.de) in the course International Media and Computing (http://imi.htw-berlin.de) by Falko Richter. The Sources of this applications are licenced by the Apache License 2.0 (http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0). The source can be found at http://code.google.com/p/androidmashup/. 
 
 Panoramio is orginally from http://code.google.com/p/apps-for-android/ 
 Radar is orginally from http://code.google.com/p/apps-for-android/ 
 
 FONMaps is owned by FON Wireless (http://www.fon.com)
 
 OpenFONMaps is based on the OpenStreetmap implementation by http://code.google.com/p/osmdroid/ 
 
 if you have any questions write an email to info@androidmashup.org
